sentences.sentence: As hiring picks up, more companies are revamping their employee-referral programs.
sentences.translation: 随着用工率的回升，更多公司开始改进其员工推荐计划。

sentences.sentence: She also spoke of the progress Yahoo has made behind the scenes revamping the technology behind its Web portal.
sentences.translation: 她也谈到雅虎已经改造了其后台的技术的进展。

sentences.sentence: Most of the proposals concentrate on revamping the regulators rather than the regulated, perhaps because it is easier.
sentences.translation: 多数提议都是针对监管者，而不是面对被监管者，也许因为修补前者更容易。
